modules.name: Data.Graph
modules.comments: A data structure and functions for graphs

declarations.comments:
A graph with vertices of type `v`.

Edges refer to vertices using keys of type `k`.
declarations.title: Graph

declarations.comments:
Unfold a `Graph` from a collection of keys and functions which label keys
and specify out-edges.
declarations.title: unfoldGraph

declarations.comments:
Create a `Graph` from a `Map` which maps vertices to their labels and
outgoing edges.
declarations.title: fromMap

declarations.comments:
Turn a `Graph` into a `Map` which maps vertices to their labels and
outgoing edges.
declarations.title: toMap

declarations.comments: An empty graph.
declarations.title: empty

declarations.comments: Insert an edge from the start key to the end key.
declarations.title: insertEdge

declarations.comments:
Insert a vertex into the graph.

If the key already exists, replaces the existing value and
preserves existing edges.
declarations.title: insertVertex

declarations.comments: Insert two vertices and connect them.
declarations.title: insertEdgeWithVertices

declarations.comments: List all vertices in a graph.
declarations.title: vertices

declarations.comments: Lookup a vertex by its key.
declarations.title: lookup

declarations.comments: Get the keys which are directly accessible from the given key.
declarations.title: outEdges

declarations.comments: Returns immediate descendants of given key.
declarations.title: children

declarations.comments:
Returns all descendants of given key.

Will return bottom if `k` is in cycle.
declarations.title: descendants

declarations.comments: Returns immediate ancestors of given key.
declarations.title: parents

declarations.comments:
Returns all ancestors of given key.

Will return bottom if `k` is in cycle.
declarations.title: ancestors

declarations.comments:
Topologically sort the vertices of a graph.

If the graph contains cycles, then the behavior is undefined.
declarations.title: topologicalSort

declarations.comments: Checks if given key is part of a cycle.
declarations.title: isInCycle

declarations.comments: Checks if there any cycles in graph.
declarations.title: isCyclic

declarations.comments: Checks if there are not any cycles in the graph.
declarations.title: isAcyclic

declarations.comments: Find all keys adjacent to given key.
declarations.title: adjacent

declarations.comments: Check if the first key is adjacent to the second.
declarations.title: isAdjacent

declarations.comments: Checks if there's a directed path between the start and end key.
declarations.title: areConnected

declarations.comments:
Returns shortest path between start and end key if it exists.

Cyclic graphs may return bottom.
declarations.title: shortestPath

declarations.comments:
Returns shortest path between start and end key if it exists.

Cyclic graphs may return bottom.
declarations.title: allPaths
